original_text: But Jehosheba, the daughter of King Joram, sister of Ahaziah, took Joash the son of Ahaziah and stole him away from among the king's sons who were being put to death, and she put him and his nurse in a bedroom. Thus they hid him from Athaliah, so that he was not put to death.
korean_text: 요람 왕의 딸 아하시야의 누이 여호세바가 아하시야의 아들 요아스를 왕자들이 죽임을 당하는 중에서 빼내어 그와 그의 유모를 침실에 숨겨 아달랴를 피하여 죽임을 당하지 아니하게 한지라

sentences.original_text: took Joash the son of Ahaziah
and stole him away from among the king's sons
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 아들들 중에서 그를 몰래 데려와

sentences.original_text: who were being put to death,
and she put him and his nurse in a bedroom.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 그의 유모를 침실에 두었다.

sentences.original_text: Thus they hid him from Athaliah,
so that he was not put to death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽임을 당하지 않게 하기 위함이었다.
